sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the First Sword of Braavos is often chosen by the Sealord because he is the most observant of the [[Bravos]] (sword fighters), not necessarily because he is the most talented swordsman; therefore he is best able to protect him from threats both seen and unseen.
